function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of personal data such as national identity number, passport number, phone number, travel history, and health status.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive personal information and potential misuse of data.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection policies, encryption measures, and limited access to authorized personnel only.","Technologies":"Encryption technology, data anonymization, access control mechanisms.","People":"Registered users, individuals in the database.","Owner":"Government authorities, developers, data protection agencies."},{"Description":"Use of GPS, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth to track user's movements and interactions.","Impact":"Potential invasion of user privacy and tracking of sensitive activities.","Mitigation":"Transparent communication with users, providing opt-in/opt-out features, and strict regulation of data usage and storage.","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving algorithms, geofencing, consent management tools.","People":"General public, registered users.","Owner":"App developers, government authorities, privacy regulators."},{"Description":"Centralized storage of transaction details, calls, and messages.","Impact":"Risk of data vulnerability and exposure of private communication and financial information.","Mitigation":"Adopt decentralized storage systems, end-to-end encryption for communications, and regular security audits.","Technologies":"Decentralized ledger technology, end-to-end encryption protocols, security auditing tools.","People":"Registered users, individuals in contact with registered users.","Owner":"App developers, data protection authorities, government agencies."}]}
